(Ok, I'm not sure who Yanshosh wanted to grab in the CR chambers, but 
I'm assuming it was Cybershark, correct me if I'm wrong)


Unitron:


Unitron walked into the CR chamber, looking around.  No one, he 
thought to himself silently.  Walking over to a CR Chamber, he looked 
in and saw Cybershark.

Opening the CR chamber, Unitron grabbed the unconcsious (Is he?), and 
put him over his shoulder.  Unitron walked out of the door, heading 
for Zardus.
